main event: Mrs. Dee and children observed a triangular shaped object with a steady burning light moving in a southeasterly direction in Clearfield, Utah on May 23, 1964.
interesting points: The object was larger than an aircraft and appeared to travel across the sky at a high speed., The object was described as having a steady burning light., The sighting involved multiple witnesses including children who were observing stars., The object's trajectory was reported to be southeast towards the Wasatch Mountains., Investigators suggested it could possibly be a balloon or aircraft, and it was attributed to the satellite ECHO 1.
sighted object: triangular shaped object with a steady burning light
witness description: Mrs. Dee and her son along with a neighbor girl and boy were present during the observation.
